divs: Sighting DetailsWHILE VACATIONING IN BAJA MEXICO MY HUSBAND WAS ON THE PATIO AND SAW A STAR-LIKE OBJECT MOVING FROM THE SOUTH TO THE NORTH. AT FIRST HE THOUGHT IT WAS AN AIRPLANE BUT AFTER WATCHING IT THERE WERE NO BLINKING LIGHTS. WE VACATION HERE ALOT AND NORMALLY HIGH ALTITUDE FLIGHTS TRAVEL FURTHER EAST ON A NORTH OR SOUTH ROUTE. THIS OBJECT FOR THE FIRST TEN MIN WAS TRAVELING SLOW TO FAST , THEN FAST TO SLOW IN A NORTHERN HEADING. THEN SUDDENLY TURNED TO THE NORTH EAST AND THEN PRECEDED SLOW TO FAST FOR APPROX 2 MINUTES. THEN SLOWLY TURNED A BRIGHT ORANGE AND SLOWLY FADED OFF INTO THE DISTANCE. WE THOUGHT IT MAY HAVE BEEN A METEOR OR POSSIBLY "SPACE JUNK". THE REASON I'M CONTACTING YOU IS BECAUSE OF THE ABRUPT MOVEMENTS AND TURNS IT MADE. MY WIFE AND I TALKED ABOUT IT AND CAME TO THE CONCLUSION IT WAS NOT A METEOR, SATILLITE OR AIRPLANE, BUT SOMETHING ABNORMAL. IF YOU NEED MORE DETAILS PLEASE CONTACT US AT OUR EMAIL ADDRESS. THANK YOU, RICHARD & JANICE BATES
Summary: STARLIKE BUT CHANGED TO ORANGE AS IT ACCELERATED
